Detailed Description

PatchLevelFillPattern implementation for patch interior filling.

For documentation on this interface see PatchLevelFillPattern

Those fill boxes for this PatchLevelFillPattern will consist of the patch interiors on the destination level only.

See also:
RefineAlgorithm
RefineSchedule

void SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelInteriorFillPattern::computeFillBoxesAndNeighborhoodSets ( boost::shared_ptr< hier::BoxLevel > &  fill_box_level,
boost::shared_ptr< hier::Connector > &  dst_to_fill,
const hier::BoxLevel &  dst_box_level,
const hier::IntVector &  fill_ghost_width,
bool  data_on_patch_border 
) [virtual]

Compute the boxes to be filled and related communication data.

The computed fill_box_level will be the boxes of dst_box_level, the "interior" of the destination level.

Parameters:
[out] fill_box_level Output BoxLevel to be filled
[out] dst_to_fill Output Connector between dst_box_level and fill_box_level
[in] dst_box_level destination level
[in] fill_ghost_width Ghost width being filled by refine schedule
[in] data_on_patch_border true if there is data living on patch borders
Precondition:
dst_box_level.getDim() == fill_ghost_width.getDim()

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelInteriorFillPattern::needsToCommunicateDestinationFillBoxes (  )  const [virtual]

Return false because source patch owner can compute destination fill boxes.

For this fill pattern, the source owner can compute fill boxes for all of its destination neighbors using local data, so this method returns false, allowing a communication step to be skipped.

Returns:
false.

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.

bool SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelInteriorFillPattern::doesSourceLevelCommunicateToDestination (  )  const [virtual]

Tell RefineSchedule to communicate data directly from source level to destination level.

RefineSchedule should attempt to fill the destination level from the source level on the same resolution to the extent possible.

Returns:
true

Implements SAMRAI::xfer::PatchLevelFillPattern.
